context.rdfs:comment: An order item is a line of an order. It includes the quantity and shipping details of a bought offer.
context.rdfs:label: OrderItem

properties.rdfs:comment: The current status of the order item.
properties.rdfs:label: orderItemStatus

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of the item ordered. If the property is not set, assume the quantity is one.
properties.rdfs:label: orderQuantity

properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier of the order item.
properties.rdfs:label: orderItemNumber
